title: Curcumin–polydopamine nanoparticles alleviate ferroptosis by iron chelation and inhibition of oxidative stress damage
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,14934-14941
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA02336F, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Li Lei, Jiali Yuan, Qingqing Yang, Qiuxia Tu, Haijun Yu, Liangzhao Chu, Lei Tang, Chunlin Zhang
A Cur–PDA NP based nanoregulator was developed for targeting ferroptosis to mitigate neuron degeneration by regulating iron and ROS homeostasis, suppressing lipid peroxidation and oxidative stress, and improving mitochondrial function.
